rooms

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • rooms.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A room is a logical representation a game room. So one room contains a game and a userlist with all users in this room.
    Author:
    Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann
